item.title: Rethinking Fourier Transform from A Basis Functions Perspective for Long-term Time Series Forecasting
item.description: Revolutionizing long-term time series forecasting, a new Fourier Basis Mapping method enhances accuracy by precisely interpreting frequency coefficients and considering time-frequency relationships, a…
